metadata.title: Procedural Enclosure Toolkit - Template Index
metadata.description: Legal templates for enforcing procedural compliance in NY and Federal courts

templates.title: Procedural Enclosure (Universal)
templates.subtitle: CPLR §2219(a) - Written Order Requirement
templates.description: Universal template for demanding statutory compliance from any role (judge, attorney, clerk).

templates.title: Article 78 Mandamus
templates.subtitle: CPLR §7803(1) - Compel Ministerial Duty
templates.description: Petition to compel performance of duty required by law.

templates.title: Notice of Appeal
templates.subtitle: CPLR §5515 - Appellate Procedure
templates.description: Notice of appeal to Appellate Division. Must be filed within 30 days.

templates.title: Emergency Stay
templates.subtitle: CPLR §5519 - Stay Pending Appeal
templates.description: Motion for stay of enforcement pending appeal. Emergency relief.

templates.title: FOIL Request
templates.subtitle: Public Officers Law §87 - Records Request
templates.description: Freedom of Information Law request for records. 5-day response required.

templates.title: Judicial Conduct Complaint
templates.subtitle: 22 NYCRR Part 100 - Judicial Ethics
templates.description: Complaint to NY Commission on Judicial Conduct.

templates.title: Procedural Enclosure - Judge
templates.subtitle: CPLR §2219(a) - Judicial Compliance
templates.description: Formal demand for judge to issue written decisions with stated grounds.

templates.title: Procedural Enclosure - Attorney for Child
templates.subtitle: FCA §§241-249 - AFC Duties
templates.description: Demand for Attorney for Child to fulfill statutory duties.

templates.title: Procedural Enclosure - Assigned Counsel
templates.subtitle: RPC 1.2-1.4 - Attorney Duties
templates.description: Demand for assigned counsel to provide competent representation.

templates.title: Procedural Enclosure - Court Clerk
templates.subtitle: CPLR §5017(b) - Clerk Duties
templates.description: Demand for court clerk to maintain accurate records and timely processing.

templates.title: Procedural Enclosure - Opposing Counsel
templates.subtitle: RPC 3.3-3.4 - Ethical Obligations
templates.description: Demand for opposing counsel to comply with professional conduct rules.
